title: Embedding based Large Documents Classification
author: Charana H U
description: System that can classify the new multiple paged(10+ pages) document into the respective category based on the content of the document which will be compared with the existing documents in the system. So our approach is to converting the documents into embedding and storing those embedding and respective class label in Milvus. When we get a new document we convert it into embedding and search for the nearest embedding in Milvus and return the class label of the nearest embedding.
